screens.name: Add_and_edit_information_about_the_Primary_Contractor
screens.label: Add and edit information about the Primary Contractor

validationRule.errorMessage: Company Name should be within 80 characters.
Contact Name should be within 80 characters.
House Name should be within 80 characters.
House Number should not be greater than 5 digits.
Street should be within 80 characters.
Town should be within 80 characters.
City should be within 80 characters.
Postal Code should be within 80 characters.

fields.name: ContractorDisplayText
fields.fieldText: Who is the contractor/company working on site?

validationRule.errorMessage: Contractor's Name should be within 80 characters.
Telephone Number should be 11 digits and contains only numbers.
House Name should be within 80 characters.
House No. should be within 80 characters.
Street should be within 80 characters.
Town should be within 80 characters.
City should be within 80 characters.
Postal Code should be within 80 characters.
3rd Party Vehicle Registration should be within 80 characters.

fields.name: NameDisplayText
fields.fieldText: Enter below the name and position of the individual employed by the contractor that you spoke to on site

validationRule.errorMessage: Name should be within 80 characters.
Position should be within 80 characters.

fields.name: ContractorDisplayText2
fields.fieldText: Is the company who have caused the damage working on behalf of another company e.g. Amey working on behalf of STW

fields.name: Isthe_contractor_working_on_the_behalf_of_another_company_utility_builder
fields.fieldText: Is the contractor working on the behalf of another company/ utility builder?

fields.name: Dtext
fields.fieldText: If yes, please state details on next screen

fields.fieldText: Error! User Not found

validationRule.errorMessage: Type of Damage should be within 80 characters.

fields.fieldText: Type of work being undertaken by the Contractor

validationRule.errorMessage: Limit should be within 80 characters.

fields.name: Comments_on_the_cause_including_details_of_what_was_seen_on_site
fields.fieldText: Comments on the cause, including details of what was seen on site

validationRule.errorMessage: Limit should be within 80 characters.

fields.fieldText: Is the location of the damage in the area of the Contractor's work?

fields.name: What_actions_did_you_carry_out

validationRule.errorMessage: Limit should be within 500 characters.

fields.fieldText: Is excavation required to initiate repair?
